channel.title: Career on Geeky Geekery
channel.description: Recent content in Career on Geeky Geekery

item.title: What is Scraper Engineer?
item.description: Since day one at my current company, I’ve been on the Scraper Team. Recently, I was promoted to Scraper Tech Lead. I thought it would be a good time to write about what it means to be a scraper engineer, as well as the role and responsibilities of scraper engineers in a trending company.
